mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ChargingRecord ( chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_ServiceCharge, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, chRe_EndDate, pk_UserCard, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode, chre_parter_user_logo, chre_parter_extradata, chRe_ThirdCode, chRe_ThirdType, account_id, chRe_TipPrice, chRe_PeakPrice, chRe_FlatPrice, chRe_valleyPrice, chRe_TipMoney, chRe_PeakMoney, chRe_FlatMoney, chRe_valleyMoney )values ( #{chreElectricpileid}, #{chreUsingmachinecode}, #{chreTransactionnumber}, #{chreReservationnumber}, #{chreStartdate}, #{chreChargingnumber}, #{chreChargingmethod}, #{chreResttime}, #{chreCode}, #{chreBeginshowsnumber}, #{chreEndshowsnumber}, #{userPhone}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{JPrice}, #{FPrice}, #{PPrice}, #{GPrice}, #{ServicePrice}, #{QuantumDate}, #{JMoney}, #{FMoney}, #{PMoney}, #{GMoney}, #{chreEnddate}, #{pkUserCard}, #{userOrgNo}, #{payMode},#{thirdUsrIdentity},#{thirdExtraData}, #{thirdCode}, #{thirdType}, #{accountId}, #{tipPrice}, #{peakPrice}, #{flatPrice}, #{valleyPrice}, #{tipMoney}, #{peakMoney}, #{flatMoney}, #{valleyMoney} )

insert into tbl_ChargingRecord ( chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_ServiceCharge, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, pk_UserCard, chRe_UserOrigin, chRe_FrozenAmt, chRe_RealAmt, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode , chre_parter_user_logo, chre_parter_extradata, chre_usrgateip, account_id, chRe_TipPrice, chRe_PeakPrice, chRe_FlatPrice, chRe_valleyPrice, chRe_TipMoney, chRe_PeakMoney, chRe_FlatMoney, chRe_valleyMoney )values ( #{chreElectricpileid}, #{chreUsingmachinecode}, #{chreTransactionnumber}, #{chreReservationnumber}, #{chreStartdate}, #{chreChargingnumber}, #{chreChargingmethod}, #{chreResttime}, #{chreCode}, #{chreBeginshowsnumber}, #{chreEndshowsnumber}, #{userPhone}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{JPrice}, #{FPrice}, #{PPrice}, #{GPrice}, #{ServicePrice}, #{QuantumDate}, #{JMoney}, #{FMoney}, #{PMoney}, #{GMoney}, #{pkUserCard}, #{userOrigin}, #{FrozenAmt}, #{RealAmt}, #{userOrgNo}, #{payMode} ,#{thirdUsrIdentity},#{thirdExtraData}, #{usrGateIp}, #{accountId}, #{tipPrice}, #{peakPrice}, #{flatPrice}, #{valleyPrice}, #{tipMoney}, #{peakMoney}, #{flatMoney}, #{valleyMoney} )
mapper.update:
update tbl_ChargingRecord set chRe_EndDate=#{chreEnddate}, chRe_BeginShowsNumber=#{chreBeginshowsnumber}, chRe_EndShowsNumber=#{chreEndshowsnumber}, chRe_Status = #{status},
chRe_ServiceCharge = #{ServicePrice},
chRe_TipPrice =#{tipPrice},
chRe_PeakPrice =#{peakPrice},
chRe_FlatPrice =#{flatPrice},
chRe_valleyPrice =#{valleyPrice},
chRe_TipMoney =#{tipMoney},
chRe_PeakMoney =#{peakMoney},
chRe_FlatMoney =#{flatMoney},
chRe_valleyMoney =#{valleyMoney},
chRe_ThirdCode =#{thirdCode},
chRe_ThirdType =#{thirdType} where chRe_TransactionNumber=#{chreTransactionnumber}
mapper.select: select cr.pk_ChargingRecord, cr.chRe_ElectricPileID, cr.chRe_UsingMachineCode, cr.chRe_TransactionNumber, cr.chRe_ReservationNumber, cr.chRe_StartDate, cr.chRe_ChargingNumber, cr.chRe_ChargingMethod, cr.chRe_RestTime, cr.chRe_EndDate, cr.chRe_Code, cr.chRe_BeginShowsNumber, cr.chRe_EndShowsNumber from tbl_ChargingRecord cr left join tbl_ChargingOrder co on cr.chRe_Code = co.chOr_Code where co.pk_ChargingOrder=#{pkChargingOrder}

select pk_ChargingRecord, chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_ServiceCharge, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, pk_UserCard, chRe_UserOrigin, chRe_FrozenAmt, chRe_RealAmt, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode, chRe_ThirdCode, chRe_ThirdType, chre_parter_user_logo, chre_parter_extradata, chre_usrgateip, account_id, chRe_TipPrice, chRe_PeakPrice, chRe_FlatPrice, chRe_valleyPrice, chRe_TipMoney, chRe_PeakMoney, chRe_FlatMoney, chRe_valleyMoney from tbl_ChargingRecord where chRe_TransactionNumber=#{chreTransactionnumber}

select pk_ChargingRecord, chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_ServiceCharge, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, pk_UserCard, chRe_UserOrigin, chRe_FrozenAmt, chRe_RealAmt, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode, chRe_ThirdCode, chRe_ThirdType, chre_parter_user_logo, chre_parter_extradata, chre_usrgateip, account_id, chRe_TipPrice, chRe_PeakPrice, chRe_FlatPrice, chRe_valleyPrice, chRe_TipMoney, chRe_PeakMoney, chRe_FlatMoney, chRe_valleyMoney from tbl_ChargingRecord where chRe_UsingMachineCode=#{chreUsingmachinecode} and chRe_ChargingNumber=#{chreChargingnumber} and (chRe_Status=2 or chRe_Status=0 or chRe_Status=4 or chRe_Status=8) order by chRe_StartDate desc limit 1

select pk_ChargingRecord, chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_ServiceCharge, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, pk_UserCard, chRe_UserOrigin, chRe_FrozenAmt, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode, chRe_ThirdCode, chRe_ThirdType, chre_parter_user_logo, chre_parter_extradata, chre_usrgateip from tbl_ChargingRecord where user_id=#{userId} and (chRe_Status=2 or chRe_Status=0 or chRe_Status=4 or chRe_Status=8) order by chRe_StartDate desc limit 1

select pk_ChargingRecord, chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, pk_UserCard, chRe_UserOrigin, chRe_FrozenAmt, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode from tbl_ChargingRecord where user_id=#{accountId} and (chRe_Status=2 or chRe_Status=0 or chRe_Status=4)

select pk_ChargingRecord, chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber, user_phone, user_id, chRe_Status, chRe_JPrice, chRe_FPrice, chRe_PPrice, chRe_GPrice, chRe_QuantumDate, chRe_JMoney, chRe_FMoney, chRe_PMoney, chRe_GMoney, pk_UserCard, chRe_UserOrigin, chRe_FrozenAmt, chRe_OrgNo, chRe_PayMode, chre_usrgateip from tbl_ChargingRecord where user_id=#{userId} and chre_parter_user_logo=#{thirdUsrIdentity} and (chRe_Status=2 or chRe_Status=0 or chRe_Status=4)

select pk_ChargingRecord, chRe_ElectricPileID, chRe_UsingMachineCode, chRe_TransactionNumber, chRe_ReservationNumber, chRe_StartDate, chRe_ChargingNumber, chRe_ChargingMethod, chRe_RestTime, chRe_EndDate, chRe_Code, chRe_BeginShowsNumber, chRe_EndShowsNumber from tbl_ChargingRecord where pk_ChargingRecord=#{pkChargingrecord}
select sum(a)+sum(b) num from( (select count(*) a from tbl_chargeinfo_ac where user_id = #{userId}) t1 , (select count(*) b from tbl_chargeinfo_dc where user_id = #{userId}) t2 )
mapper.update:
update tbl_ChargingRecord set chRe_ReservationNumber=#{chreReservationnumber}, chRe_StartDate=#{chreStartdate}, chRe_ChargingNumber=#{chreChargingnumber}, chRe_ChargingMethod=#{chreChargingmethod}, chRe_RestTime=#{chreResttime}, chRe_EndDate=#{chreEnddate}, chRe_Code=#{chreCode}, chRe_BeginShowsNumber=#{chreBeginshowsnumber}, chRe_EndShowsNumber=#{chreEndshowsnumber}, chRe_Status = #{status}, chRe_ThirdCode=#{thirdCode}, chRe_ThirdType=#{thirdType}
where chRe_TransactionNumber=#{chreTransactionnumber}
update tbl_ChargingRecord set chRe_ThirdCode=#{thirdCode}, chRe_ServiceCharge = #{ServicePrice}, chRe_ThirdType=#{thirdType} where chRe_TransactionNumber=#{chreTransactionnumber}
